desktopMode.onlyForMobile: we are only available on mobile devices
desktopMode.whatsappLinkMessage: Access {{appName}} by clicking on the link {{link}}

appDemo.usersNearYou: are doing the same near you, connect with them

confirmationDialog.info: Are you sure? You can't undo this action afterwards.

aboutPage.aboutApp: @@time lets you connect with pepople doing the same activity as you. mark you activity and find users doing the same activity as you at the same time.
aboutPage.easySignin: Easy sigin with just your email, no need to remember password.
aboutPage.accessOnBrowser: Access on a browser, add to home screen for quick access. No separate installations needed from stores.
aboutPage.privacy: Your data or location is not shared outside the app ecosystem. Delete your account and data anytime from the Profile section
aboutPage.languageAlert: You might not get users who marked activity in a different language. So prefer using English for marking your activity.
